price: 53. Rabbigayow! Waxaanu rumeynay waxa aad soo dejisey oo Waxyi ah, oo raacnay Rasuulka, ee nagu qor (naga dhig) la jirka markhaatiyada(ummadda Nabi Muxamad).
arabic: رَبَّنَآ ءَامَنَّا بِمَآ أَنزَلۡتَ وَٱتَّبَعۡنَا ٱلرَّسُولَ فَٱكۡتُبۡنَا مَعَ ٱلشَّٰهِدِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā āmannā bimā anzalta wa-ittabaʿnā al-rasūla fa-uk'tub'nā maʿa al-shāhidīna
